QuestData.Title: Break An Arm
QuestData.Description: The insurgents you marshaled gave me some bad news, $n.$b$bThe arcanists loyal to Elisande have reactivated the Arm of the Magistrix. The most powerful construct ever attempted, it raged out of control and decimated an entire district before it was disabled. Truly they must be desperate to turn it against us.$b$bThe scouts have spotted it in the Crimson Thicket to the north. We cannot allow it to reach full power if we are to succeed.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Defeat the Arm of the Magistrix.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat the Arm of the Magistrix.
QuestData.RewardText: We almost lost the invasion before we could begin. Good work.
